channel.title: Favicon on Blog - Guel Bandeira
channel.description: Recent content in Favicon on Blog - Guel Bandeira

item.title: How to add a favicon on a Hugo blog?
item.description: What tool did I use? This blog runs at no cost, with no database and on a free host. To not lie to you, the only cost I had was the domain name, for $10, but I already had that domain for my portfolio, and you can host this blog without using your custom domain. For the blog itself this runs without any money from my pockets, and the tool I used is called Hugo, a Go framework designed to build static websites.
